channel.title: Comments on: Getting remote disk information with Windows PowerShell
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Milind Koyande
item.dc:creator: Milind Koyande
item.description: Thanks for the great article, I was looking for the same as doing the freedisk space calculation on all the server manually is really a headache.. but this made my day. Thanks again.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the great article, I was looking for the same as doing the freedisk space calculation on all the server manually is really a headache.. but this made my day. Thanks again.
